page.title: 05Tourism in Shiskine
page.content: ************************************** Quite a few people come to Shiskine and Blackwaterfoot for their holidays, mostly city folk from the mainland. There are four hotels in the area, and many people stay in them. Traditionally, many people in the valley let out cottages or even their own house as they move out to a'summer house' for the summer. Some houses provide bed & breakfast, and there are some newer chalets for letting. Some people, of course, own a second home in Shiskine. Tourists may have a holiday golfing, pony treking, fishing or hill-walking. Blackwaterfoot has a safe sandy beach in one part, and caves and rock pools to explore in another. {Many people come back to Shiskine {year after year. **************************************
